name: TechNewsFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Get real-time access to a curated selection of the most significant technology stories of the day. This feed amalgamates high-quality articles, opinion pieces, and breaking news from a variety of reputable sources, providing you with a comprehensive view of the current tech landscape. Whether you're a tech enthusiast, a professional in the field, or someone who likes to stay informed, our feed offers you a time-saving way to stay up-to-date without having to visit multiple websites.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
